attributes.action: Stop holiday companies from putting up the prices during school holidays.
attributes.additional_details: Sign the petition and stop low income families from suffering and holiday companies making more profit by bumping up prices in the half terms. There using the governments new rules to line their own pockets. We all agree kids need to be in school but that doesn't mean holiday companies should be allowed to rip us off now families are forced to take a holiday in half term
attributes.background: The government says you can't remove your children from school for a holiday. But holiday companies put up the prices during half terms and state its because it's peak times. This means many families can't afford a holiday at all.
